sentences.english: Big cui know vibration of politics careful is unqualified, regret not broke his mind early.
sentences.chinese: 大崔知道振达政审不合格，后悔没早点断了他的念想。

sentences.english: How to deal with go abroad formalities of politics careful representative?
sentences.chinese: 如何办理出国政审代理手续？

definition: to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
to rise through the ranks (as a party cadre)
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to join a political party (esp. the Communist Party)
to enter oneself for an examination
to sit for the second round of a two-stage exam
to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to transfer a dossier/to consult a dossier
